Programming

I am not really a sport person. I never got entertained by sports. I did try in my freshman year to stand in the front row, waving a huge banner for multiple football games. The only activity I do that somewhat related to sport is doing cardio. In my leasure time, I prefer to sit at home and write up some apps. I like to solve problems online and I enjoy reading news about technology

Photography

I always bring my camera almost to everywhere I go. I love taking pictures. And, I do take good pictures. When I was a teenager, I would wake up at 5am everyday, cycle 5km away from home to capture a beautiful dawn.
